meanings.definition: A small, round, sweet bread typically baked in a cup-shaped tin.
meanings.sent1: I enjoyed a delicious muffin for breakfast.
meanings.sent2: She bought a blueberry muffin from the bakery.
meanings.sent3: The muffin was so tasty, it made me dance a little.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as warm and comforting as a freshly baked muffin.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the muffin filled the room, making everyone hungry.

meanings.definition: A type of quick bread made with ingredients such as flour, sugar, and eggs.
meanings.sent1: My mom bakes the best muffins in town.
meanings.sent2: We had chocolate chip muffins for dessert.
meanings.sent3: The muffin recipe was so easy, even a cat could make it.
meanings.sent4: The muffin batter bubbled like a magical potion.
meanings.sent5: The muffin was so fluffy, it felt like eating a cloud.

meanings.definition: A slang term for a mistake or blunder.
meanings.sent1: Oops, I made a muffin on that test question.
meanings.sent2: He always seems to make a muffin when cooking dinner.
meanings.sent3: Her muffin in the presentation made everyone chuckle.
meanings.sent4: The muffin in his speech was a hilarious twist.
meanings.sent5: Making a muffin in front of the whole class was embarrassing.
